title._content: Anwar Sadat and Menachem Begin shake hands as Jimmy Anwar Sadat and Menachem Begin greet each for their first meeting at the Camp David Summit as Jimmy Carter and Rosalynn Carter watch., 09/07/1978

description._content: Title: Anwar Sadat and Menachem Begin shake hands as Jimmy Anwar Sadat and Menachem Begin greet each for their first meeting at the Camp David Summit as Jimmy Carter and Rosalynn Carter watch., 09/07/1978 Creator(s): President (1977-1981 : Carter).
